definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)

sentences.english: He also created a functioning replica of MySpace's log-in page.
sentences.chinese: 斯克姆還創建了MySpace的登陸網頁的複製品。

sentences.english: This picture is a copy. The original painting is in a museum.
sentences.chinese: 這畫是複製品，原畫藏在一個博物館裏。

sentences.english: A re-creation of Van Gogh’s Sunflower painting made entirely from sushi.
sentences.chinese: 完全用壽司做的梵高向日葵的複製品。

sentences.english: The Viking warship replica, Havhingsten af Glendalough (the Sea Stallion of Glendalough), makes its way from Dublin Bay into Dublin Port, Ireland August 14, 2007 .
sentences.chinese: 北歐海盜船複製品從愛爾蘭柏林灣航行到柏林港口。

sentences.english: They may use it for both the original product and the copies of it.
sentences.chinese: 他們使用它在原產品和它的複製品上。

sentences.english: This is a mark that discriminates the original from the copy.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個使原作與複製品有區別的標誌。

sentences.english: Ross Perot will be followed by a flock of little re-Rosses.
sentences.chinese: 裴洛走了之後，會有一大羣小複製品出現。

sentences.english: Photographs can easily be made into giclee art reproductions.
sentences.chinese: 照片可以很容易地製作成畫冊專輯藝術複製品。

sentences.english: Delectable replicas of such traditional Chinese art pieces as porcelain vases are also on displacdfds. com.
sentences.chinese: 傳統藝術中的精美瓷器複製品也在本次展覽中展出。

sentences.english: That picture is a fine reproduction of the original.
sentences.chinese: 那幅畫真是一幅極妙的複製品。

sentences.english: This is the original painting, and these others are copies.
sentences.chinese: 這畫是原作，其他的是複製品。

sentences.english: Your daughter is not your clone.
sentences.chinese: 你的女兒並非你的複製品。

sentences.english: She gave him a miniature copy of the periodic table of elements.
sentences.chinese: 她給了奧巴馬一個元素週期表的微型複製品。

sentences.english: We built Disney Land and the Neuschwanstein Castle Replica in the Name of MONEY…The Chinese copy our concept again and come out ahead.
sentences.chinese: 我們以金錢的名義建了迪士尼樂園和天鵝堡的複製品。

sentences.english: Thus, there is a duplication of effort that lengthens the.
sentences.chinese: 因此，這是一個延長程序和增加不必要費用的複製品。

sentences.english: Stretcher bars for canvas giclee art reproductions are easy to assemble.
sentences.chinese: 藝術複製品的油畫作品畫冊專輯擔架酒吧都容易組裝。

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 jia1 Bo2 wu4 guan3

definition: to read and pass on/to pass on for perusal
Cai Guoqiang (1957-), contemporary Chinese artist working with firework displays and light shows
to collect in a museum or library/museum collection/library holdings
handed down from ancient times/family heirloom
